title: Tom Brady on Patriots’ success, Drake Maye, and Josh McDaniels

title: A new high-speed chairlift is spinning at Bretton Woods in N.H.
author: Kristi Palma
bullets: Skiing It's affectionately called "Becky" and replaced the previous lift of 35 years.
The new BEQ II lift at Bretton Woods in New Hampshire.
Bretton Woods By Kristi Palma December 12, 2025 | 11:34 AM 1 minute to read Skiers and riders at New Hampshire’s Bretton Woods have been riding a new high-speed lift this week.

title: DOC sees uptick in deaths in recent months, citing suicides as the leading cause
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Local News Six “apparent” suicides have occurred so far this year, compared to none in 2024 and just one each in 2023 and 2022.
An inmate walks back to his cell block at MCI-Shirley Medium Correctional Center.

title: Livestream: Closing arguments in the Brian Walshe murder trial
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Crime Attorneys are set to make their final pitches to the jury Friday before deliberations begin.
Livestream via NBC10 Boston.

Jurors will hear the final, competing narratives in the Brian Walshe murder trial Friday, as attorneys are set to walk them through the key evidence one last time during closing arguments in Norfolk Superior Court before deliberations begin.

title: JPMorgan wants its name on the Boston skyline with South Station Tower sign
